alert.note: Alert for Grenada; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:37PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Carroll, southwestern Grenada and northeastern Leflore Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 537 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Money, or 7 miles north of Greenwood, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Avalon around 550 PM CDT. Greenwood around 555 PM CDT. Teoc around 610 PM CDT. Malmaison around 625 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Mississippi.
